speaker: Andres Almiray
summary:
Groovy is the fastest growing JVM language out there. It might be because it is so easy for Java developers to pick it up, but also because there's an increasing number of projects and libraries that make use of Groovy as the starting point. In this session we'll cover the following topics:
- Frameworks
    Grails, Griffon, Gaelyk
- Build Systems
    Gant, Gradle
- Testing
    Easyb, Spock
- Code Quality
    CodeNarc, GMetrics
- Libraries
    GPars, GContracts
title: The Groovy Ecosystem
